attributes.action: Extend the M56 motorway  to the port of Holyhead
attributes.additional_details:
Much International Goods traffic  uses the Port of Holyhead.  However  for more than one hundred miles  between Queensferry and Holyhead  there is only a poor quality dual carriageway  which  simply does not have the capacity  to "safely"  cope with all the vehicles using that road.

Therefore, please consider  extending the M56  motorway  to Holyhead,  and save lives at the same time.

rejection.details: This would be for the Welsh Government
